titleStmt.title: Scotlands ancient obligation to England and publike acknowledgment thereof, for their brotherly assistance to, and deliverance of them, with the expence of their blood, and hazzard of the state and tranquility of their realm, from the bondage of the French, in the time of their greatest extremity. Anno Dom. 1560.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Macock, for M. S.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
